name: Bones Of Steel
description:
Bones Of Steel is a fun 2d game about troll tank arena fighting with many game modes and beautiful levels. In order to play, extract the files and open BonesOfSteel.exe. Share with your friends and... enjoy!!!

-- Modes -- Campaign

Survive In A Deadly Island Unlocking Mysteries On The Way

Explore our huge open world map. Find deadly traps on the way and destroy all of the castles in order to survive. Try collecting powerups and play it smart cause it's a long way to the end and trust us, it will not be easy!!!

Co-Op & Multiplayer

Join Others

Have fun fighting with your friends and show them who is really the best tank fighter out there or join even more players worldwide and prove your skills. Choose between our jungle map and 8 more impressive arena maps!!!

Single Player

Challenge Our Skynet AI Tank If You Dare

In this mode you can fight against our powerful npc. It can find paths with A-STAR. It can use its special ammo efficiently and knows when to power up. You can try to beat it if you like, but first try to survive its unstoppable fury
